author: Marc Freedman
title: John Prine, Battling Coronavirus, Always Knew Loneliness as the Public Health Crisis It Is Today | Opinion
description: How sadly ironic it is that Prine has taken ill with the coronavirus, just as the virus has taken social isolation to the forefront and the front page.
content: A few years back, I returned to Philadelphia to visit my father, who was in his final months, living in a nursing home. On the long ride from the airport, I tuned into WXPN, the public radio station where I worked in my 20s as a DJ, spending hours putting tog… [+3111 chars]
